title: Did Mike Hackabe complain about Michelle Wolfe after making fun of him on Twitter?
subtitle: Two tweets were collected from the former presidential candidate of the World People ' s Congress Party to highlight a contradiction in his views regarding what should be considered a comedy.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: Mike Hackabe wrote on Twitter that the White House reporter is celebrating a "bullying" dinner after inviting people to watch his own show unless they lack a "feel of humor."
